name: Paper War: online Turn base
description:
Paper War, reminiscent of childhood and school memories

In this online turn base game, you have a 7-person army under your control.

Your forces and those of your opponents are drawn on paper.

Troops include infantry, helicopters, tanks, jets, trenches, sniper and etc.

Of course, this is only a part of troops in game. Currently you can select your favorite troops from 27 different military forces. After selecting the desired forces, you must choose the best place for them on the ground to gain more power. This high selection power puts a lot of different strategies in front of you.

We want to give you the good news that in this game you can compete with thousands of other players like yourself online.

So choose the most effective forces. Set them in the best places on the ground and go to the battle of the opponents.

Game Features:

-Compete in 1-on-1 turn-based wars!

-Get new military forces

-Set up and discover new strategies!

-Upgrade your troops!

-Get Awesome rewards and backpacks!

And more fun, cool features!
